page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: Thanks are due to many individuals and organisations for the time and effort which they put into the fieldwork,researching and production of block 02300361 of the Domesday Project. To the Staff and Pupils of the Longfield Middle School,who went out to research for the Land Survey,who interviewed many Longfield residents and who presented their findings in pictures and drawings. Thanks are also due to the members of Langafel,Longfield,Longfield Hill,and Southfleet Women's Institutes, for their help in transporting groups of children around the Block,and for making available their local knowledge. Finally,thanks must go to all the local residents for their patience and goodwill in answering innumerable questions.
